$comment: NOTE: This file is for human reference ONLY. For programmatic use, use the GET '/json_schema/response/$schema_name' endpoints, or within conch itself, json-schema/response.yaml.

vendor_name.description: the vendor's name for the datacenter

disks.$comment: disks is included only when device 'phase' is earlier than 'production'

latest_report.description: the contents of the device report. Given its age we cannot provide a schema.

location.$comment: location is included only when device 'phase' is earlier than 'production'

nics.$comment: nics is included only when device 'phase' is earlier than 'production'

target_hardware_product.description: Details of the hardware product the device is expected to be based on its current position and the rack layout.

report.description: the contents of the device report. Given its age we cannot provide a schema.

additionalProperties.description: additional keys will be hardware product aliases

Error.description: this is the superset of all error schemas

validation_plan_id.$comment: this property will become nullable in v3.3 and removed in v4.0

JSONValidatorError.description: serialized JSON::Validator::Error object: a single failure from validating a document with a JSON Schema

LegacyValidation.$comment: this definition will be removed in v4.0

LegacyValidationPlan.$comment: this definition will be removed in v4.0

LegacyValidationPlans.$comment: this definition will be removed in v4.0

LegacyValidations.$comment: this definition will be removed in v4.0

data.description: the parsed form of the query parameters, as they were passed to the schema for validation

error.const: query parameters did not match required format

validation_plan_id.$comment: this property will be removed in v3.1

error.const: request did not match required format

ValidationError.description: base structure for all query_param, request, response validation error responses

data.description: any supplementary details will be included here

validation_plan_id.$comment: this property will be removed in v3.1

location.$comment: location should not be considered canonical when device 'phase' is 'production' or later
location.description: Last reported location of the relay
